sentences.en: Half of the island's population has no usable English.
sentences.cn: 这座岛上的居民有一半无法用英语交流。

sentences.en: He told me which wells were usable along the road.
sentences.cn: 他告诉我沿线哪些井是可用的.

sentences.en: If already produced bacterial afterwards to send infection, usable antibiotic is treated.
sentences.cn: 假如已发生细菌继发感染, 可用抗生素治疗.

sentences.en: Leak proof construction . Usable and rechargeable along any direction.
sentences.cn: 完全密封性,可于任何方向使用均不漏液.

sentences.en: New techniques make it possible to recover usable things from waste.
sentences.cn: 藉新技术即能从废弃物中回收可用之物.

sentences.en: Protective structure for overheating, usable in anti explosive sites.
sentences.cn: 具有过热保护装置, 可用于防爆性场合.

sentences.en: Store in seal drum at dry place, usable life over 1 year.
sentences.cn: 产品密封包装后贮存于阴凉、干燥处, 贮存期一年.

sentences.en: The bike is rusty but usable.
sentences.cn: 自行车生锈了，但还能骑。

sentences.en: The computer language involved was readily usable.
sentences.cn: 所涉及的计算机语言便于使用。

sentences.en: The lawnmower is a bit rusty but still usable.
sentences.cn: 剪草机虽然生锈了但仍然可以使用.

sentences.en: The manuscript might be usable if the author could fill it out a little.
sentences.cn: 如果作者稍加充实,原稿就可用.

sentences.en: This device helps make virtual reality a more usable and accessible technology.
sentences.cn: 这一装置有助于使虚拟现实成为更可用、更便利的技术。

sentences.en: This tyre is so worn that it is no longer usable.
sentences.cn: 这条轮胎磨损得很厉害,不能再用了.

sentences.en: Typically, only about 95 % of the volume is usable.
sentences.cn: 典型地, 只有大约95%的体积是可使用的.

sentences.en: Unnecessary variation is the enemy of a coherent, usable design.
sentences.cn: 不必要的差异是可用且一致的设计的大敌.

sentences.en: We will reduce the large quantity of instrument readings to usable statistics.
sentences.cn: 我们将把大量仪表读数归纳成实用统计数字.

words.tran_cn: 可用的；便于使用的（等于usable）
习惯的；二手的，使用过的
有用的，有益的；有帮助的

phrases.tran_cn: 使用面积；楼面可用面积；可用地板面积

trans.tran_cn: 可用的，合用的，便于使用的，使得
trans.tran_en: something that is usable can be used
